name: Dino Dash Party
description:
Gird up your dinosaur suit and challenge your friends to discover who is the one who is most in touch with their prehistoric side!

Compete against each other in a variety of minigames, add modifiers to change your gameplay experience, or go into our challenge mode with crazy wacky stages.

[Grand Prix mode]
Do you prefer a curated experience? Our fixed circuit feature features 5 stages specially picked for players to play!

For the players who prefer to experience the game via their own two claws, the custom circuit feature is available as well!

[Modifiers]
Dino Dash Party offers 9 modifiers to evolve the gameplay of our minigame stages! These modifiers are promised to add good chaotic fun to familiar stages.

[Play with friends]
Grab a controller and play with up to 3 other friends, either through local co-op or steam remote play!

Please note: This is a local multiplayer game and at least one controller is required to play the game.
